titles.title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan, Washington County, Utah.
Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act
Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act
Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act
This bill expands the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan to include additional habitat for the desert tortoise in Utah and recognizes a transportation and utility corridor in the Beaver Dam Wash National Conservation Area.
